inclusion.criterion: Have clinical pancreatic insufficiency (defined as the need for pancreatic enzyme replacement)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Have no other medical problems except CF (and its complications)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Are taking any medicines (other than for CF and its complications)
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Are taking more than 10 mg/d elemental zinc supplements
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Have had major GI surgery, including gut resection, but not including surgery for decompression of meconium ileus (if this was the presenting feature of CF)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Wilson disease confirmed by high liver copper concentration. No other medical problems except CF and its complications.
